results.title: Thyroid Cancer Risk Assessment Tool - National Cancer Institute
results.description: The R package thyroid implements a risk prediction model developed by NCI researchers to calculate the absolute risk of developing a second primary thyroid cancer (SPTC) in individuals who were diagnosed with a cancer during their childhood.

results.title: Colon Cancer Risk Assessment Tool - Gauss Program - National Cancer Institute
results.description: GAUSS program that projects absolute colon cancer risk (with confidence intervals) according to NCI’s CCRAT algorithm

results.title: Risk Assessment Macros and Software Programs - National Cancer Institute
results.description: Overview of risk assessment macros and software programs offered by DCEG

results.title: Breast Cancer Risk Assessment Tool SAS Macro (Gail Model) - National Cancer Institute
results.description: SAS macro (commonly referred to as the Gail Model) that projects absolute risk of invasive breast cancer according to NCI's (BCRAT) algorithm for specified race/ethnic groups and age intervals.

results.title: Breast Cancer Risk Assessment Tool 2.0 R Package - National Cancer Institute
results.description: BCRA is an R package that projects absolute risk of invasive breast cancer according to NCI’s Breast Cancer Risk Assessment Tool (BCRAT) algorithm for specified race/ethnic groups and age intervals.

results.title: Colon Cancer Risk Assessment - SAS Macro - National Cancer Institute
results.description: SAS macro that projects absolute risk of colon cancer according to NCI’s CCRAT algorithm.

results.title: Breast Cancer Risk Assessment Tool 2.0 License Agreement - National Cancer Institute
results.description: Breast Cancer Risk Assessment Tool 2.0 License Agreement

results.title: CARE Model: Breast Cancer Risk Assessment for African American Women - National Cancer Institute
results.description: SAS macro that allows researchers to estimate an African American woman's risk of developing invasive breast cancer over specified age interval

results.title: Breast Cancer Risk Assessment Model for Hispanic Women   - National Cancer Institute
results.description: Breast Cancer Risk Prediction macro for projecting risk for Hispanic Americans

results.title: Risk Assessment Tools and Methods - Public Health Impact of DCEG Research - National Cancer Institute
results.description: Risk Assessment Tools and Methods

results.title: Breast Cancer with Mammographic Density Risk Assessment SAS Macro - National Cancer Institute
results.description: A SAS macro that projects absolute invasive breast cancer risk for white women based on measurements of mammographic density and other risk factors.

results.title: Asian Pacific Islander American Women - Breast Cancer Risk Assessment SAS Macro - National Cancer Institute
results.description: Software that projects absolute breast cancer risk over defined age intervals for Asian and Pacific Islander American women with specific risk factors

results.title: Breast, Endometrial, and Ovarian Risk Assessment Tool SAS Macros - National Cancer Institute
results.description: Breast, Endometrial, and Ovarian Risk Assessment Macro

results.title: Interactive Risk Attributable Program (IRAP) - National Cancer Institute
results.description: IRAP is an interactive computer program which calculates both point estimates and confidence intervals for attributable risk, based on regression models, from cohort or case-control data.

results.title: R Package for Individual Risks of Lung Cancer and Lung Cancer Death - National Cancer Institute
results.description: R package that calculates risks using published lung cancer risk models

results.title: Lung Cancer Risk Models for Screening (R package: lcrisks) - National Cancer Institute
results.description: Calculates individual risks of lung cancer and lung cancer death based on covariates

results.title: Online calculator estimates lifetime risk of developing cancer from exposure to ionizing radiation - National Cancer Institute
results.description: Online calculator for estimating lifetime risk of cancer incidence from exposure to ionizing radiation

results.title: Lung Cancer Risk Models for Screening License Agreement - National Cancer Institute
results.description: Lung Cancer Risk Models for Screening License Agreement

results.title: Individual Risks of Lung Cancer and Lung Cancer Death Models2 - National Cancer Institute
results.description: R package that calculates risks using published lung cancer risk models

results.title: Individual Risks of Lung Cancer and Lung Cancer Death Models License Agreement - National Cancer Institute
results.description: Individual Risks of Lung Cancer and Lung Cancer Death Models License Agreement

results.title: Binomial Linear Model R Package - National Cancer Institute
results.description: R package for estimating absolute risk and risk differences from cohort data with a binomial linear or LEXPIT regression model.
